permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1957, Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: SELECTION and general design considerations of the components for high-speed, high-performance turbopumps are discussed here. A simple mathematical example of aerodynamic theory is presented for pump and turbine design. The author discusses choice of design for the specific performance desired. Considerations of numerous factors influence selection. Example of a typical high-speed turbopump is given based on the theory developed here.
